name: auto-assign-pr
description: Automatically assign newly created PRs to the creator

hooks.command: gh pr view --json number >/dev/null 2>&1 && gh pr edit --add-assignee @me || true

pr=$(gh pr list --repo "$TOOL_INPUT_owner/$TOOL_INPUT_repo" --head "$TOOL_INPUT_head" --state open --json number --limit 1 --jq '.[0].number // empty') && [ -n "$pr" ] && gh pr edit "$pr" --repo "$TOOL_INPUT_owner/$TOOL_INPUT_repo" --add-assignee @me || true
